name: ATM
description:
• Key features:
    • The system is always on.
    • The system does not operate without a valid credit card and a matching PIN code.
    • The system provides the following services:
    • Withdrawal with a receipt.
    • Withdrawal without a receipt.
    • Credit information.
  • Business and integrity rules:
    • A client has:
      • First name and last name
      • A credit card.
    • A credit card has:
      • The client first and last name.
      • A unique identifier.
      • A bank account identifier.
    • A bank account has:
      • The client details (i.e., name, id, etc.)
      • A list of linked credit card.
      • The credit balance
    • The ATM machine is:
      • Always on and connected to the banking network.
      • Accepts any valid credit card.

requirements.description: While not in use, the system display a welcome screen.
When a welcome screen is displayed, the system reacts only to the insertion of a credit card.
Once a credit card is inserted and matching PIN code is given, the system returns the credit card and display the following options: Withdrawal with a receipt.
Once a credit card is inserted and matching PIN code is given, the system returns the credit card and display the following options: Withdrawal without a receipt.
Once a credit card is inserted and matching PIN code is given, the system returns the credit card and display the following options: Credit information.
Withdrawal: The user can request to withdrawal one of the following amount of money: 50, 100, 200, 500, 1000, or a custom amount.
Withdrawal: The action succeeds only if : The amount is smaller than 2000
If the cash is taken: If the user chose to withdraw with a receipt, print out a receipt which includes: The client details: name and bank account number.
If the cash is taken: If the user chose to withdraw with a receipt, print out a receipt which includes: The client details: The time of which the withdrawal took a place.
If the cash is taken: If the user chose to withdraw with a receipt, print out a receipt which includes: The client details: The amount of money that was withdrawn.
If the cash is taken: End the session.
Credit information: If the user chooses Credit information the system will display: The client details: name and bank account number.
Credit information: If the user chooses Credit information the system will display: The account balance.
Credit information: If the user chooses Credit information the system will display: The current date and time.
Credit information: The information will be displayed for 15 seconds and then the session will end.
End the session if one of the following happens: The operation ended successfully.
End the session if one of the following happens: On any error (wrong PIN or invalid amount of money).
